channel.title: Help plz with putting my server on status page and ppl connecting
channel.description: i got this new DLINK wireless router,and now i cant host my runescape private server ive portforwarded added exceptions made dynamic ip , and all that,WHAT AM I MISSING? :mad:

item.title: Help plz with putting my server on status page and ppl connecting
item.dc:creator: @iceboy555555 iceboy555555
item.description:
@iceboy555555 wrote:

i forwarded port 43594 and i ran the server whilst putting on status page,made exceptions…Idk what im missing[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 03:11:45 PM[/size][hr]add me on msn : tehleetapple@live.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 03:14:52 PM[/size][hr]tell me how to make static ip please?

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz with putting my server on status page and ppl connecting

@Evanz wrote:

Well if you have portforwarded…made exceptions…using correct ip + port… running the server whilst trying to put on status page… then it should work…
